name: Muds Dress-Up!
description:
Dress up your favourite DGoD character in this THRILLING game of moving clothes around a screen! Teenage smoking spot and decrepit old desk chair included. Other characters sold separately.

For those of you who are seeing this dog girl for the first time, here's her comic!

http://dgodcomic.tumblr.com

(Feel free to move any objects off the page that bug you, you can slide those speech bubbles right on outta there.)
